typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceOutput
sourceOutput select(mapColumn(
		AC_REG = Column_1,
		EVE = Column_2,
		DESC = Column_3,
		BEGINDAY = Column_4,
		BEGINTIME = Column_5,
		ENDDAY = Column_6,
		ENDTIME = Column_7,
		BAS = Column_8
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRenameColums
